body_html:
For anyone else struggling with this, I made the following change to pytorch/aten/CMakeLists.txt

SET(CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH
  /usr/local/anaconda2
  ${CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH})

just below project(ATen).

This is obviously a hack (it will be overwritten on future git pulls if that file is modified. Nevertheless, it gets the job done in the meantime.

body:
For anyone else struggling with this, I made the following change to `pytorch/aten/CMakeLists.txt`

```
SET(CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH
  /usr/local/anaconda2
  ${CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH})
```

just below `project(ATen)`.

This is obviously a hack (it will be overwritten on future `git pull`s if that file is modified. Nevertheless, it gets the job done in the meantime.
